channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: To 'graduate' from poverty, they can borrow to build a business. So why aren't they?
item.description: It's called the "graduation" approach — both financial and moral support to help people move from extreme poverty to self-sufficiency. But in this inn...

item.title: King Charles III says early diagnosis allows his cancer treatment to be reduced

item.title: Fired Michigan football coach charged with home invasion and stalking

item.title: It's Christmastime —– and if you live in the Alps, watch out! Krampus is coming
item.description: In Salzburg, Austria, Christmas involves both St. Nick and Krampus, a mythological punisher with roots stretching back to late antiquity and many fans...

item.title: Church Nativity scenes add zip ties and gas masks to protest immigration raids

item.title: One million households without power in Ukraine after Russia attacks energy grid
item.description: The latest overnight attacks come as US envoy Steve Witkoff prepares to hold more talks with Ukraine's president.

item.title: Angry fans throw chairs and bottles at Messi event in India
item.description: The Inter Miami and Argentina forward is in India for a tour, taking in events in Kolkata, Hyderabad, Mumbai and Delhi.

item.title: Belarus frees 123 prisoners as US lifts sanctions
item.description: Opposition activist Maria Kolesnikova is among those released in exchange for a deal with the US.

item.title: Police find no evidence former prince asked guard to investigate Giuffre
item.description: British police say they have found no evidence that Andrew Mountbatten-Windsor asked a bodyguard to investigate Virginia Giuffre.

item.title: Raul Malo's musical legacy
item.description: Raul Malo, lead singer and guitarist for The Mavericks, died on Dec. 8. "CBS Saturday Morning" looks back at Malo's musical impact and legacy.

item.title: Cambodia shuts border crossings with Thailand as fighting continues
item.description: It comes despite US President Donald Trump saying both sides had agreed to a ceasefire deal.

item.title: King Charles III raises awareness about early detection amid cancer treatment

item.title: Street art festival sees Lagos turned into 'open-air gallery'
item.description: Nigeria's biggest city is known for its vibrant arts scene, nightlife and creativity, but street art is relatively unknown.
